verses.verse: Not <S%G3361><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Teachers <S%G1320><s%> Be. <S%G1096><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> We Shall Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> For Often <S%G1063><s%> We Stumble <S%G4417><s%> All. <S%G537><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Stumble Not, <S%G4417><s%> This One Is <S%G3778><s%> A Perfect <S%G5046><s%> Man, <S%G435><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> To Bridle <S%G5468><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body. <S%G4983><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Horses <S%G2462><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bits <S%G5469><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouths <S%G4750><s%> We Put, <S%G906><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Obey <S%G3982><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> We Turn About. <S%G3329><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ships, <S%G4143><s%> So Great <S%G5082><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Violent <S%G4642><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> Being Driven, <S%G1643><s%> Are Turned About <S%G3329><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> A Very Small <S%G1646><s%> Rudder, <S%G4079><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Wherever <S%G302><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Impulse <S%G3730><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Steers <S%G2116><s%> May Will. <S%G1014><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> A Little <S%G3398><s%> Member <S%G3196><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Boasts Great Things. <S%G3166><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> A Little <S%G3641><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> How Large <S%G2245><s%> A Wood <S%G5208><s%> It Kindles; <S%G381><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tongue Is <S%G1100><s%> Fire, <S%G4442><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> Is Set <S%G2525><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3196><s%> Our Members, <S%G2257><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Defiler Of <S%G4695><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Setting On Fire <S%G5394><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Course <S%G5164><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Nature, <S%G1078><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Set On Fire <S%G5394><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gehenna. <S%G1067><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> For Every <S%G1063><s%> Species <S%G5449><s%> Beasts <S%G2342><s%> Both Of <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Birds, <S%G4071><s%> Of Creeping Things <S%G2062><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Things Of The Sea, <S%G1724><s%> Is Subdued <S%G1150><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Has Been Subdued <S%G1150><s%> By <S%G3588><s%> Species <S%G5449><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Human; <S%G442><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> To Subdue; It Is <S%G1150><s%> An Unrestrainable <S%G183><s%> Evil, <S%G2556><s%> Full <S%G3324><s%> Of Poison <S%G2447><s%> Death Bringing, <S%G2287><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> Therewith <S%G846><s%> We Bless <S%G2127><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Therewith <S%G846><s%> We Curse <S%G2672><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> ' According To The <S%G2596><s%> Likeness <S%G3669><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Are Made. <S%G1096><s%>

Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Goes Forth <S%G1831><s%> Blessing <S%G2129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cursing. <S%G2671><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Ought, <S%G5534><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> To Be. <S%G1096><s%>

The <S%G3385><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fountain <S%G4077><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Opening <S%G3692><s%> Puts Forth <S%G1032><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sweet <S%G1099><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bitter? <S%G4089><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Is Able, <S%G1410><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> A Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Olives <S%G1636><s%> To Produce, <S%G4160><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> A Vine <S%G288><s%> Figs? <S%G4810><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> Fountain Is Able <S%G4077><s%> Salt <S%G252><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sweet <S%G1099><s%> To Produce <S%G4160><s%> Water. <S%G5204><s%>

Who Is <S%G5101><s%> Wise <S%G4680><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Understanding <S%G1990><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%> Let Him Shew <S%G1166><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Works <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Meekness <S%G4240><s%> Of Wisdom; <S%G4678><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Emulation <S%G2205><s%> Bitter <S%G4089><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Contention <S%G2052><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Heart, <S%G5216><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Do Boast Against <S%G2620><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lie <S%G5574><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> From Above <S%G509><s%> Coming Down, <S%G2718><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Earthly, <S%G1919><s%> Natural, <S%G5591><s%> Devilish. <S%G1141><s%>

<S%G3699><s%> For Where <S%G1063><s%> Emulation <S%G2205><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Contention Are; <S%G2052><s%> There Is <S%G1563><s%> Commotion <S%G181><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Evil <S%G5337><s%> Thing. <S%G4229><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> From Above <S%G509><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> <S%G4412><s%> First <S%G3303><s%> Pure <S%G53><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Then <S%G1899><s%> Peaceful, <S%G1516><s%> Gentle, <S%G1933><s%> Yielding, <S%G2138><s%> Full <S%G3324><s%> Of Mercy <S%G1656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Fruits <S%G2590><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> Impartial <S%G87><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unfeigned. <S%G505><s%>

<S%G2590><s%> But The Fruit <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Is Sown <S%G4687><s%> For Those That <S%G3588><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> Peace. <S%G1515><s%>
